sentences: Work programme on the revision of the guidelines for the review of biennial reports and national communications: Under this agenda item (FCCC/SBSTA/2013/INF.2), Nepal, for the LDCs, highlighted transparency and verifiability.
She called for support for developing countries, so that they could become expert reviewers.
A contact group will be chaired by Rittaa Pipati (Finland) and Qiang Liu (China).
